DOC.criteria: woman age 35 year history primary infertility normoresponder ( antral follicle count 510 one ovary early follicular phase grade I II embryo transfer agree undergo endometrial biopsy COH cycle . All patient stimulate luteal phase long protocol . endocrinopathies ( include diabetes mellitus , hyperprolactinemia , Cushing 's disease , congenital adrenal hyperplasia ) , systemic disease , collagen disorder , hypercholesterolemia , sickle cell anemia , history neoplasm ; high risk history OHSS use concurrent medication ( e.g. , insulinsensitizing drug , GnRH antagonist ) patient proceed follicle retrieval severe male infertility require TESA/TESA mullerian tract anomaly history endometrial instrumentation surgery within month study agree undergo endometrial biopsy COH cycle .
